name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comfy Mode - Themes for Eye Relief

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing experience with dark themes on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing a wide range of eye-friendly themes. This extension offers a refreshing visual overhaul that promotes comfortable and enjoyable web surfing.

With just a single click, you can effortlessly switch between themes, instantly transforming the appearance of websites into soothing, easy-on-the-eyes designs.

Current themes:
- Dark
- Midnight
- Black
- Notepad

Work in progress:
- Improve compatibility across different sites
- Improve theming by providing background variations on different container elements
- Addition of new themes
- Improve performance
